title: Half & Half
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Haaah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That was a heavy sigh, Hanayo-chan. What happened?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, Nozomi-chan. Actually, the result of the fortune prediction I pulled yesterday was a “Great Curse”. It’s the first time I ever saw it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Wah, that’s a big pull huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>So it is really like that!? I wonder what bad things will happen to me from now…. Uuh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, sorry, by “big pull” I didn’t mean it like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Actually, fortune and misfortune happen half and half in someone’s life. So, the fact that you pulled a “Great Curse” yesterday means you have the best of luck right now♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-, is that so!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Have you never thought that your luck hasn’t been that good recently, so God has to give you the “Great Curse” to make it balanced? So it’s all okay! Since you have good luck, let’s go to the arcade! If you try now you will certainly get something from the claw machine~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
